{include "default_salutation"} –

Earlier this year, hundreds of activists across the state lobbied their state representatives on key ACLU-sponsored legislation. Thanks to your activism, our bills have moved through committee and floor votes, but now we need to get them to the finish line!

Join us for our Summer Recess Legislative Program starting next Tuesday, July 20, at 6 p.m.

Level Up! Summer Recess Legislative Program

Join our SoCal lobby team to protect civil rights and liberties in our state.

Tuesday, July 20, 6 – 7:30 p.m.
Legislative Overview and Lobby 101 Training

Saturday, July 24, 10:30 a.m.
Lobbying Practice Session
Lobby visits to take place between July 27 to August 5.

Virtual
Register


During our kickoff session, you'll get the nuts and bolts of priority bills like Senate Bill 2, which would create a process to decertify law enforcement officers who commit serious misconduct, and Assembly Bill 256, which would extend the landmark Racial Justice Act to people who have previously been harmed by racist sentencing.

You'll then learn how to speak with your state legislator with confidence and schedule a lobby visit during the summer recess week ­­– July 27 to August 5.

Register now for our Tuesday kickoff.
